thread.title: Clean, friendly hotel in a great location.
thread.title_full: Clean, friendly hotel in a great location. - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: appreciaters
title: Clean, friendly hotel in a great location.
text: The Hotel Belleclaire is one of our favorite places to stay in Manhattan. The location is perfect. You are close to subway, Central Park, and yet away from the loud hustle of downtown. There is a market next door for snacks and picnic items. The staff is accommodating and courteous. It is our go to place to stay in the city.
